title: [Help] Misc. Slab-Serif (Bravo! Logo) ? ? ?
content:
This is the Bravo! logo:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BravoLogo_5538.jpg)
  
.

I need to know what typeface the “CUCINA ITALIANA” part of the logo is in.  
Like so....

\_

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bravo_5991.gif)

I’m stumped :(

 [‹ Voyeur´s Dream plate](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031539/http:/typophile.com/node/43859 "Go to previous forum topic") [id script font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031539/http:/typophile.com/node/43262 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pr3ciousroy

comments.content:
Latin 725 Roman (Bold?) squooshed to about 80% is pretty close...

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/latin-725/roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421031539/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/latin-725/roman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/latin-725/roman/")
